alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:01PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pima County through 645 PM MST... At 600 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a couple strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of San Isidro, or 21 miles northeast of Sells, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and areas of blowing dust with reduced visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Avra Valley, Queens Well, Santa Rosa Ranch and Silver Bell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
